short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Chrome extension for studying kanji, in the browser!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Embark on a captivating journey through the world of Japanese characters with Random Kanji, your ultimate companion for N5 Kanji study right in your browser! Perfect for learners of all levels, this Chrome extension adds a sprinkle of randomness to your Japanese language studies, making each session a delightful adventure.
